First of all, I’m doing a CAD model to use as reference, but I just can’t get the assembly to work properly. The problem is: everything  works fine till I fix the actuator (or more specifically, the part that the actuator is suposed to revolute around). When I do that, Onshape says the assembly is overdefined. I’ve been on this for days, and honestly don’t know what to do. I’ll really apreciate any help.\u003cdiv class=\"lightbox-wrapper\"\u003e\u003ca class=\"lightbox\"
